title: CMPD charges suspect with murder in 1990 killing of Kim Thomas
summary: Marion Gales, a longtime person of interest in the 1990 killing of Kim Thomas Friedland, is now charged with murder in the case.
charlotte_impact: Solves a decades-old murder case, bringing closure and justice for the victim and their family.

title: Father arrested after courthouse fight with man accused of killing his son
summary: The fight happened between the father of Jamariyae Dixon and Marion McKnight. McKnight is charged with murder in Dixon's death.
charlotte_impact: Highlights ongoing grief and tensions within the justice system after a son's death.

title: Man charged with murder in east Charlotte Food Lion shooting
summary: A murder charge follows a fatal east Charlotte shooting, initiated by an argument, leaving one dead and bystanders at risk as shots hit multiple vehicles.
charlotte_impact: Details a fatal shooting at a Food Lion, raising concerns about public safety.

title: Teen faces murder, kidnapping charges after north Charlotte shooting
summary: A 19-year-old is charged with murder, robbery and kidnapping after a Feb. 9 shooting that left one man dead, according to CMPD.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a teen facing severe charges, reflecting concerns about youth crime in Charlotte.

title: 2 MS-13 leaders sentenced to decades in federal prison
summary: Both men were sentenced for racketeering and violence.
charlotte_impact: Reports on the sentencing of MS-13 leaders, highlighting efforts to combat organized crime.

title: Matthews woman accused of trying to kill man with her car
summary: Investigators said it stemmed from a domestic dispute.
charlotte_impact: Reports a domestic dispute escalating to attempted murder, raising concerns about violence.

title: Delivery driver pleads guilty to voluntary manslaughter in Uptown shooting death of 15-year-old
summary: Emotional courtroom hearing ends with 48- to 70-month prison sentence for Keshawn Boyd
charlotte_impact: Covers the sentencing in a shooting death, emphasizing the consequences of violent crimes.

title: Charlotte man sentenced to life in prison for violent habitual felon status
summary: Daven Fetherson, 48, has a lengthy criminal history, with arrests dating back to 1995.
charlotte_impact: Details a man's life sentence due to his habitual felon status, reflecting justice system.

title: Deadly shooting under investigation in Rock Hill
summary: The victim, a 19-year-old man, died at the scene.
charlotte_impact: Reports a deadly shooting in Rock Hill, contributing to regional crime concerns.

title: Wanted man arrested in Gastonia on multiple charges after multi-agency manhunt
summary: A collaborative law enforcement effort led to the arrest of Otis Lamar Hunter, wanted on serious felony charges.
charlotte_impact: Details the arrest of a wanted man, reflecting collaborative law enforcement efforts.

title: Officials release final report in house fire that left Denny Hamlin's father dead
summary: A house fire on Blacksnake Road in Gaston County left the father of NASCAR driver Denny Hamlin dead in December.
charlotte_impact: Reports on the tragic loss of a NASCAR driver's father in a house fire in Gaston County.

title: 'Truly one of a kind': Rowan County teen killed in crash
summary: Victoria "Tori" Overcash, a senior at Jesse C. Carson High School, died in a crash involving a garbage truck near China Grove on Thursday.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a local teen's death in a tragic accident, impacting the Rowan County community.

title: Charlotte chef wins $171K, plans to launch food truck
summary: Charlotte chef Jose Naranjo won a $171K Cash 5 jackpot and plans to launch a food truck, turning years of cooking for others into a personal culinary venture.
charlotte_impact: Features a chef's success and entrepreneurial aspirations to launch a food truck.

title: She's going to lose her life insurance. Is genetic testing to blame?
summary: An unexpected diagnosis, or even genetic testing that shows worrisome findings, could mean you can’t get a policy.
charlotte_impact: Examines the impact of genetic testing on life insurance policies, raising ethical questions.

title: Charlotte's dining scene is growing, but not everyone is surviving
summary: Charlotte's restaurant scene is evolving rapidly, with a surge in new openings and an increase in closures of long-standing eateries due to rising costs.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the challenges faced by Charlotte's restaurants amid rapid growth and rising costs.

title: Fed proposes easing rules to boost big banks in US mortgage market
summary: If banks return to the market, experts said that could mean more competition for borrowers, more options for homebuyers, and possibly better terms.
charlotte_impact: Reports on proposed changes to mortgage market regulations, potentially affecting homebuyers.

title: North Carolina court rules no refunds for Duke Energy customers despite illegal charges
summary: The North Carolina Court of Appeals ruled that Duke Energy customers won't get refunds for improperly collected charges.
charlotte_impact: Addresses legal decisions affecting Duke Energy customers and utility charges.

title: Curling finds a home in Charlotte, building community through an unexpected winter sport
summary: A growing group of curlers in the Queen City is proving you don’t need snow-covered mountains to create connection on the ice.
charlotte_impact: Showcases community-building through an unconventional sport in Charlotte.

title: York County Christmas tree farm says proposed data center next door threatens their business
summary: When finished, the nine-building campus will back right up to the 95-acre farm.
charlotte_impact: Highlights a business dispute over a proposed data center, affecting local economy.

title: Two days in the 70s before another winter drop
summary: Friday will be near 80 degrees but Monday's highs will be 35-40 degrees colder. A couple of rain/storm chances Friday through Sunday.
charlotte_impact: Details weather fluctuations, affecting daily life and planning for Charlotte residents.
